duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the growth and operation of a CommunityAmerica branch location.
Leads staff in reaching their individual, team, and credit union goals through effective one-on-one coaching and team meetings.
Oversees an interactive, consultative, interview process that deepens member relationships by providing financial direction to assist members in meeting their goals.
Ensures that proper policies, guidelines, and procedures are in place to meet the strategic goals of the branch and ensure fiscal responsibility for the Credit Union.
Overall branch market penetration through member acquisition, relationship expansion, and member retention for assigned branch market.
Coach, mentor, and provide development opportunities for staff.
Proactively support and coach to an exceptional level of cross-selling credit union products or services to existing and potential members through a consultative sales approach.
Focus on determining members’ needs, cross-selling appropriate services, and continually building and enhancing member relationships.
Convey information to members on products and services in an enthusiastic and positive manner.
Refers to Financial Planning Services and the Credit Union’s mortgage department.

education_certification.credential: Three (3) or more years’ experience in a financial institution in a management role along with a four (4) year degree in a related field preferred. Additional management experience may be considered in lieu of a four (4) year degree.
Demonstrated track record of leading sales teams to achieve organizational goals.
History of working in a fast-paced environment.
Strong connection with the local community.
